author: Mary Bowerman
description: The first results from NASA's Juno probe show massive Earth-sized storms on Jupiter's poles, and a magnetic field even stronger than expected, NASA said in a statement.
title: NASA spacecraft spots Earth-sized cyclones on Jupiter

description: Earth is likely to hit more dangerous levels of warming even sooner if the US pulls back from its pledge to cut carbon dioxide pollution, scientists said. That's because America contributes so much to rising temperatures.
title: What happens to Earth if US exits climate deal? - Times of India

author: Seth Borenstein
description: America contributes so much to rising temperatures that Earth is likely to reach more dangerous levels of warming even sooner if the U.S. retreats from its pledge to cut carbon dioxide pollution.
title: What if U.S. quits climate deal? Doesn't look good for Earth

author: https://www.facebook.com/jenmillsmetro
description: From the tallest building on earth to the Brandenberg Gate.
title: Landmarks worldwide lit up in remembrance of Manchester victims

author: BY SETH BORENSTEIN
description: WASHINGTON (AP) — Earth is likely to reach more dangerous levels of warming even sooner if the U.S. retreats from its pledge to cut carbon dioxide pollution, scientists said. That's because America contributes so much to rising temperatures. President Donald Trump, who once proclaimed global warming a Chinese hoax, said in a tweet Saturday that he would make his "final decision" next week on whether the United States stays in or leaves the 2015 Paris climate change accord in which nearly every nation agreed to curb its greenhouse gas emissions.
title: What if US quits climate deal? Doesn't look good for Earth

author: acc
description: An Arizona lawmaker who believes the Earth is 6,000 years old is the new chairwoman of the state Senate committee that oversees education-related legislation. Republican Sen. Sylvia Allen of Snowflake has a gift for going viral with statements that would be edited out of most school textbooks: – Buying into conspiracy theories surrounding “chemtrails” — […]
title: An Arizona lawmaker who believes the Earth is 6,000 years old is the new chairwoman of the state Senate committee that oversees education-related legislation.

description: On Thursday, NASA released the first image of the planet's weather -- swirling clouds, turbulent winds and Earth-sized cyclones.
title: The weather on Jupiter is pure art in this new Juno satellite image
